website_summaries.verdict: This oil proves to be a bargain purchase as it comes in the form of a large, 16-ounce bottle.
pros: Warms up in hands to provide more stimulation and comfort
Has a long shelf life when stored properly
Comes in a 16-ounce bottle, making it long-lasting
Has a pleasant and light almond and lavender scent

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells very nice and makes my skin very smooth. It absorbs into the skin so it doesn't leave you feeling oily. I don't think it would leave oil stains on beds or clothes, but I put a towel down when my partner gives me a massage using this oil just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. THIS. STUFF!! The smell of lavender is the primary fragrance and it's so relaxing! Perfect after shaving or for massage. It's not too heavy as long as you rub it in properly. A word of caution, if your honey is massaging the spots you can't reach and isn't gingerly, it will stain sheets! So make sure there's a towel under you or have the stain stick handy!
customer_reviews.author: CoveGirl

customer_reviews.title: My current favorite
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on going into massage therapy school when I purchased this, then some long-term health issues arose. So now I have this bottle of massage oil on my hands, and I've been using it both for some light couple's massages with my other half and for post-shower skin hydration. The smell is stronger than most oils I've seen before, but that isn't a drawback to me. It's not overpowering, but it allows my skin to maintain a mild, lavender scent for the rest of my day, and I love it. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Barraza

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: If proper amount is used it will not leave your skin to oily
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: S
customer_reviews.text: Received in a soaked package,, not sure if it was done before or after it was shipped,, 1/2 of one bottle leaked out, i order a lot of this for a friend that is a massage therapist,, hopefully this won't happen again,, the product its self is the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil, very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, reliable oil. The scent is not too strong or flowery, nor is the oil unpleasant if you ingest a small amount of it. Stays slick for a long time, and also doesn't seem to irritate skin. I use this a lot of times while in bed and don't find it necessary to clean up or shower after a massage, it's surprisingly not very messy
customer_reviews.author: Mercury

customer_reviews.title: LAVENDER AROMA
customer_reviews.text: Very delicate but sweet lavender scent. No almond that I could tell. Good viscosity, not too heavy unlike Dr Teals. ( Too think, IMHO) great for massage and absorbs well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calming scent
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but is not overpowering - it’s a calming scent. The oil works well and really hydrates the skin.
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oli
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Best massage oil in the world. Smells amazing and really hydrate your skin not oily.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: ... not only do it's intended job but it smells amazing and it also works great in my hair as ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil does not only do it's intended job but it smells amazing and it also works great in my hair as a serum and in the bath with my bath salts & some baking soda. Invigorating, refreshing, skin feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Massage oil
customer_reviews.text: This massage is wonderful. I ordered it based on other peoples reviews and was not disappointed. The smell is pleasant and the oil is not excessively oily or greasy. Yet it does not dry up and disappear quickly like many others. A little goes a long way. When this bottle is empty I will certainly replace with the same.
customer_reviews.author: Penewise

customer_reviews.title: High quality massage oil.
customer_reviews.text: In general, I really enjoy NOW brand oils, and this is no exception. The lavender fragrance is pleasant, and 16 ounces for $12 is a steal. The bottle lasted forever, and felt like I really got a lot of value for my money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I both love the smell
customer_reviews.text: This has a VERY STRONG lavender smell to it. My wife and I both love the smell, so it's okay, but it is powerful. Otherwise it feels great and very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this oil. I've only used it a couple of times to give my boyfriend a back massage. I felt that it quickly dries though so I continuously have to keep adding more to my hands (I assure you he's not dehydrated). Perfect for those loving the soothing lavender smell but hate the oiliness of most oils.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: smells wonderful. true to its name
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this oil. Yes, it is slippy/greasy whatever but isn't all oil? The smell is intoxicating, yet not overwhelming. Overall I am very happy with this lavender almond massage oil.
customer_reviews.author: hallie

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil with a nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this oil. Great massage oil with a nice scent... will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice now and seems like a great product. Love the scent, works great for massages.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W.

customer_reviews.title: massage oil
customer_reviews.text: Great oil, love the smell and feel. Makes my skin soft Would recommend to others. I love shopping online - so easy and convienent
customer_reviews.author: DallasW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, excellent quality, nice scent. Not overwhelming for those who are sensitive to scents.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and my skin is rejoicing in the dry winter weather. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A Caveney

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this oil! Absorbs completely and doesn't leave any greasy stains.
customer_reviews.author: missdiva2727

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great, thanks!! Clean bottle with no leaks. Clear scent. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Woody

customer_reviews.title: Good smelling oil
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I use this on my lady and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: INF1DELx4

customer_reviews.title: Oily feeling and not very scented.  I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not as good compared with the previously purchased Almond Massage Oil with Lavender Extract we got at a farmer's market. This one is very "oily" feeling, and doesn't absorb into the skin as well. Maybe this is from the olive or grapeseed oil in it. And the scent: The last one had an intense lavender scent that filled the room. This one's scent is barely perceptible compared. I'm really disappointed. What do I do now with this giant jug of oil?
customer_reviews.author: RandyCPU

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. Smells good and works well for massaging.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love this product and its a must have for tender skin or use for massage. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This item was wonderful for me (and my girlfriend) Pros Smell is sweet but not overpowering, a little goes a long way, cheap, feels great on the skin. I've used this at least 10 times and have yet to even get more than 10 percent through the bottle. Would buy again and again! Cons None that I've found!
customer_reviews.author: Stewartyis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing massage oil. It smells great and work wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Carla matthews-dottin

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrance Light oil that smooths on easily and lasts ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice fragrance Light oil that smooths on easily and lasts a long time. Your skin feels moisturized and not oily. Actually use less than you might expect Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Langdon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic deal for anyone who loves the smell of Lavender. 16oz of oil is more than enough to last for a very long time and it is an excellent buy for those who are looking for a good gift for the lady or man.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: This smells amazing and feels wonderful on the skin
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing and feels wonderful on the skin. You get a lot of it for the price too. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells great. However
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great. However, no one needs this much massage oil unless they are running a commercial massage operation. The bottle is big. Think a bottle of coke. Then think about how much massage oil you actually need. Also, the lid isn't the most secure - it leaks out, and so therefore it's not very portable. Also the massage oil has gotten on my bedpsread and clothes and has stained them.
customer_reviews.author: VAreader507

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, smells strong.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat greasy and the smell is not good, wish for a little more fragrant smell than this. Good value really.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, a bit messy
customer_reviews.text: Oil is great for massage. A different design for the cap that made it less messy would be good and get this to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The smell reminds me of going to the spa and it's very soothing!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this product. It smells great, it's relaxing and it lasts for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells great, makes your skin really soft, and it's a great value. A little bit goes a long way; this bottle will last a loooong time.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kampa

customer_reviews.title: OK but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The lavender is not very detectable and the oil does not soak in well. This massage oil has too much junk added into it. I also bought some jojaba oil at the same time and it is much better feeling on the skin. The Now foods product leaves a greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: A great smelling and nice blend of various oils. Makes for a lovely massage. It's exactly as advertised and what I needed for giving the occasional massage. Makes skin soft and not too slippery. I like that it is light and organic. While it is not intended for ingestion, it doesn't taste unpleasant. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Trimber

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: The product met my expectations. The smell is different, but not too strong or overpowering. Would definitely purchased this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. Smells pleasant. Be sure to warm before use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to like this massage oil and I'm sure it would be great, however I haven't really been able to use it since my first attempt since it arrived with the cap cracked down the middle. It just leaks everywhere and I can't transport it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This massage oil is great! It is so soft and even left my hands very soft after giving the back massage. Smells great too! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: can't beat the price for the 16 oz
customer_reviews.text: fantastic price for this oil. I've used the NOW message oils on my hair for years, main ingredients for all of them are almond oil, olive oil, and grape seed oil- all awesome for hair, it has a pleasant smell and for the price beats other hair oils. It doesn't need to be refrigerated I placed it next to a gallon of milk so those looking for the 16 oz will realize it's size - it lasts a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Massage oil
customer_reviews.text: Is consistently a good oil, have not had any issues and is my go to oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil so much! Wonderful scent. They had this out at the last spa I got a massage at and I fell In love!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Coley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: NOW products are my go-to and trusted oils. Quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: COBandMOB

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is so great and last forever... My girlfriend and I massage each other about twice a week and we have used next to none. It smells very light so its not overpowering like others we have used. Its drys in about 15 min so the places where you start the massage are dry by the time you finish the massage. It wont stain your bed sheets either. I would very much recomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cannin Collera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blend of Lavender and Almond scents!
customer_reviews.text: Great to use for body massages and the scent is light enough, but very pleasant. The lavender and almond oil go very well together. Absorbs fairly quickly and does not leave a greasy feeling. I loved that it smelled like I was at a high end spa!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very light texture
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a beautiful scent and it's not greasy at all. It soaks into the skin a few moments after it's applied. I use it on my boyfriend because he has a strenuous job. I rub it in my hands before applying it and the friction causes it to give him a little soothing heat relief. He has a torn rotator cuff muscle from an accident 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bastet

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value! It has a nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value! It has a nice, refreshing scent - not overpowering like some can be - and the formulation makes a little bit go a long way. Makes for a wonderful massage without making the recipient greasy, and it leaves the skin soft and silky. My lady loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cap'nR

customer_reviews.title: really nice !!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh this smells and feels so good. It does blend well and disappear into your skin. There is no over heavy feeling of oil which is something I prefer to advoid. It does it's job !!! MY skin feels soft and cool to the touch. It's a must have, and yes a little goes a long way !!!
customer_reviews.author: loriTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Narural Oil At Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this oil for years through Amazon. The price is almost 50% cheaper than I can buy it locally & I like that the oil is pure & rich with natural scents. I use it primarily in my bath water, which leaves the skin soft & saves rubbing on lotion, all over the body, on dry wintery days.
customer_reviews.author: J. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LUV Now products, and have been using them for over 15 years:)!
customer_reviews.author: frankee*fire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those who love high quality oils and light scents. The little bit of lavender really adds to the relaxing nature of massages! An excellent buy at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Birch

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Works well for massages. The lavender smell is very light. I would rate the lavender smell slightly less than some other lavender massage oils I've smelled. But for its price, it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We loved the smell and the fact that you dont feel compelled to shower after a massage....
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice massage oil with a pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: A little bit goes a long way. The scent is really nice, but very strong. I personally liked that aspect but some people might want a little more subtlety. The oil is comfortable and feels wonderful on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Ninja

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT oil for hands, feet and skin and MASSAGE
customer_reviews.text: I'll be back for more. This oil is great for that winter dry skin Chicago imposes on we who love the city. So call me a soon to be repeat customer, just keep the quality for value.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Drimmer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Great Massage,
customer_reviews.text: My clients like this and I find it nice to work with
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Dentz

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect balance of smoothness and moisturizing. It goes a long way too.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Ledebur

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic oil
customer_reviews.text: Large bottle, smells great but not overpowering, and really helps reduce friction when massaging. A little goes a long way, so this will last a while. It's also good for moisturizing!
customer_reviews.author: Feline Fab

customer_reviews.title: great relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I tried this after I was unable to find in Lazy Acres. I add essential orange oil and it is great. After the shower get out and put this....wonderful
customer_reviews.author: kaarin navarro

customer_reviews.title: superb
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent, super relaxing. Oil is long lasting and the bottle is much bigger than you expect for the price. Will definitely buy again when I finally run out.
customer_reviews.author: QueenCun7Pun7

customer_reviews.title: but turned out just perfect. My girlfriend loved the smell and loves the ...
customer_reviews.text: First time user of this oil. Thought the smell would be overpowering, but turned out just perfect. My girlfriend loved the smell and loves the rubs better lol. Definitely will buy when I run out
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, thank you! I have been using this so well!
customer_reviews.author: Sunghyub

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My massage therapist used it and I really liked it so I bought some for my husband to use at home (he's also an LMT). It has a very nice scent-- not too strong, and the oil is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome thanks. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!I I would and plan to order this product again.I I truly appreciate and e
customer_reviews.text: Awesome thanks. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!I I would and plan to order this product again.I I truly appreciate and enjoy using this product

customer_reviews.title: ... oil with a clean and mild scent that is great for massage or as a carrier oil for DIY ...
customer_reviews.text: Lighter density oil with a clean and mild scent that is great for massage or as a carrier oil for DIY beauty products.
customer_reviews.author: stlgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for massages
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time and it gets absorbed into the skin and smells great. Any that's spilled on sheets has come out in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sundragon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: This item plus our new massage table have allow us old folk to return to our younger days when a massage was routine.
customer_reviews.author: Martin T. J. Hilger

customer_reviews.title: True lavender smell
customer_reviews.text: Most lavender products don't really smell like lavender... This stuff does.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not real happy with the aroma on this one. Not enough almond.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Light Lavender Smell, Great Massage Oil, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this oil, its smells good but not overpowering, the oil works great for body massaging, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh that's the spot
customer_reviews.text: I use this for, um, self-massage. On my neck and shoulders, I swear! Nice consistency, basically non-aromatic, and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than lotion for massages
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my husband and I giving each other massages!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells very nice and is not too sticky or oily. I love it and will buy more before this bottle is gone.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It has just the right amount of fragrance, and the oil is not too heavy. It makes massaging so much more effective and enjoyable. Will buy again.

customer_reviews.text: Item received with cap broken n unable to use properly

customer_reviews.text: all natural ingredients, and smells great! Great value too. I have to add more words to submit this review. one more.

customer_reviews.text: The massage oil seems good for giving and receiving massages on sore muscles. It seems a touch expensive, but not bad. thank you

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This oil leaves you work the muscle with smooth strokes and feels wonderful and the smell... very pleasing. Best yet is that is also absorbs well so you don't feel like you're on a slippy side after it's use. Would recommend this product to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Smells super nice and doesn't leave gross residue on your skin. And the price is great too!

customer_reviews.title: and it is great for massages
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the smell of this, and it is great for massages. She loves it on her feet.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this for an after bath body oil. The weather where I live is dry so it really helps keep my skin moisturized.

customer_reviews.text: This smells great and it works great. It was a good price and I find it easier to get massages from my girlfriend with this oil around.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it to massage my son's arms. It work well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and I haven't noticed any staining. It dries kind of quickly, which I take as a plus.

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. High quality - Good viscosity - Absorbs well - Light lavender scent - very relaxing - would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped promptly and the massage oil is AMAZING! Thank you so much!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love the oil. Great product. Goes on real smooth and doesn't leave your feeling greasy later. Real good product.

customer_reviews.title: Beware-stains!
customer_reviews.text: Stained clothes with unwashable, oil stains. Will never use again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil...feels nourishing and wonderful on your skin. I use while skin is moist as it spreads easier and makes a light coat on skin. Also great for nails and cuticles.
customer_reviews.author: Whidbey lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clients love the smell and I love the consistency of the oil
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like I was using a lot of it when giving ...
customer_reviews.text: The price, quantity and quality of this product were a huge selling point for me. It seemed like I was using a lot of it when giving my wife a massage until I looked at the bottle and it was nearly full. The scent is pleasant and not overwhelming, good coverage and made of ingredients that can be pronounced without a chemistry degree.
customer_reviews.author: CTAmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully scented and perfectly gentle on skin. Made for a wonderful soak in the sun or in the tub. :D
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work well for massages
customer_reviews.text: The oil is not smooth when I rub it on the skin. My fingers keep getting stuck as I rub, so I have to use less pressure. It is not an effective oil for massaging.
customer_reviews.author: eEraser

product_meta.title: NOW Solutions, Lavender Almond Massage Oil, Vitamin Infused Blend, Therapeutic and Soothing, 16-Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLavender Almond Massage Oil combines Organic Lavender Oil and natural Almond Oil to create a luxurious combination that soothes and relaxes. With Vitamins A, D & E included to nourish the skin, Lavender Almond Massage Oil is a highly versatile personal care and cosmetic product that won’t clog pores and will leave skin feeling refreshed and reinvigorated. This blend can help create a soothing massage or act as a natural body moisturizer.
feature_bullets: High tension levels; in need of a relaxing full-body massage with an aromatherapeutic skin moisturizer.

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation).
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968
